body:
I haven't done one of these, so why not. Ask me anything, just be clear and make sure the question is in English (Or Japanese, for that matter)

Feel free to respond to my replies

replies.body:
You're a good junior moderator. I sincerely hope you pass your trial.

My favorite sport is tied between soccer/football and American football. Favorite teams are Sevilla and New England Patriots 
favorite food has to be sushi. Not squid though.
Hot weather. I feel like I can take the heat more than the cold.

reply_to.body: Opinions? 一番好きな日本食は？
reply_to.body_tagged: Opinions? 一番好きな日本食は？

replies.body:
My reaction was やった！
English Translation: I did it!

Best thing about being staff is getting to know the community and being able to help out others and make it a better place.

The one thing I'd change on avicus is  (This is a tough one) More people. More staff and more players. Not too many people though. A small community is always better.

Opinions: I look up to you and the other Seniors, and dang, you guys seem professional. What you guys do and how you do it is what really inspired me to apply for staff. Fun fact: you're the first person to friend me on Avicus. Lol
